tool.name: PermAnalysisGriph
tool.command:
tar -zxvf $tar_Clustering -C /scratch &&
NCLUSTER=\$(basename "\$(ls -d /scratch/*/[0-9]*)") ; export NCLUSTER=\$NCLUSTER ; Rscript /home/main.R annotated_matrix \${NCLUSTER} $Format $Separator $Sp FALSE 2>>$log && mkdir -p ${html_file.files_path} && tar -zcvf zipOutput.tar.gz -C /scratch/ . 2>>$log && cp -R /scratch/* ${html_file.extra_files_path} && tree $html_file.extra_files_path -H . -T "permutationAnalysis" -o $html_file

param.name: tar_Clustering
param.help: Tar that comes out from permutationClustering GRIPH or Seurat

param.name: Sp
param.help: minimun number of percentage of cells that has to be in common between two permutation to be the same cluster

tool.help:
permutationAnalysisGriph perform the statistic evaluation assigning a cell stability score to each cell.
**IMPORTANT** This function works on hierarchical clustering algorithm such as Seurat and Griph.
